input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: CITY OF BIELSKO-BIAŁA MUNICIPAL OFFICE IN BIELSKO-BIAŁA. Summary: Construction of a Park as Part of the Project "Protection of Biological Diversity - Naturalistic Park at Stawowa and Spółdzielców Streets in Bielsko-Biała.. Description: The subject of the order are construction works related to the construction of a naturalistic park in the area of ​​ul. Stawowa and Spdzielcw, including in particular: - performance of preparatory and security works, - performance of demolition and dismantling works, - performance of works earthworks, - performance of general construction and construction works, - performance of surface works, - performance of works in the field of sanitary installations (rainwater drainage), - performance of works in the field of electrical and telecommunications installations (lighting and monitoring), - construction and installation of small architecture elements; - removal of invasive species, - removal of trees and replacement plantings; - planting of plants: trees, shrubs and perennials, - performance of care and nature activities, - performance of works accompanying activities; - tidying up the work area no later than on the day of final acceptance (removal and storage of waste, including rubble, scrap metal, etc.). Description: The subject of the order are services in the field of tree felling, tree care and road maintenance, as well as tree planting, along with maintaining the viability of seedlings, divided into tasks: Task 1: Tree felling. The task consists in cutting down 16 trees in the strips. road district roads without stump milling. The scope of work includes: felling trees, marking and securing the work site and, if necessary, securing and directing traffic during the works, removal of cut trees, clearing the road and adjacent areas of logging residues, including brush and other debris. Task 2: Tree care and roadside maintenance The task consists in: caring for individual trees: up to 20 trees with a circumference of up to 50 cm, up to 50 trees with a circumference of up to 150 cm in circumference and up to 30 pieces with a circumference of over 150 cm, consisting in making technical cuts to expose the road edge to a height of 4.60 m, and above the sidewalk up to 2.50 m, as well as clearing the trees of deadwood and dangerously hanging branches, shaping crown and clear the area (the circumference of the tree measured at a height of 130 cm) immediately each time based on the notification Order.... Published Date: 2025-12-24. Closing Date: 2026-01-08. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Watercourses and water facilities covered by maintenance in the years 2026-2028 (framework agreement) are located in Greater Poland and are under the supervision of PGW Wody Polskie of the Koło Catchment Management Board. 3. Pursuant to Art. 7 point 26 of the Public Procurement Law, a framework agreement - should be understood as an agreement concluded between the Ordering Party and one or more Contractors, the purpose of which is to establish the conditions regarding orders that may be awarded in a given period, in particular prices and, if necessary, expected quantities. 4. The subject of the order is the successive delivery of non-alcoholic beverages to military units and training ground centers in accordance with the assortment and quantity list contained in Chapter IV - "Description of part of the order" SWZ and in the "Form "offer" constituting Annex No. 1 to the SWZ. 2. Pursuant to Article 441 section 1 of the Public Procurement Law, the Ordering Party provides for the possibility of exercising the "Option Right". Description: The subject of the order is the restoration of the historic park around the ruins of the Kossak Manor in Grki Wielkie. The task will be implemented under the project entitled: Educational and Cultural Center U Kossakw, under the European Funds for Silesia Program 2021-2027 (European Regional Development Fund). As part of the task, the following works will be performed: - removal of the existing surface of concrete slabs and gravel surfaces, - removal of existing concrete curbs, - replacement of the fence in the front part, - removal of existing elements of small architecture intended for demolition, - hardening the area using a mineral, permeable surface, - framing the surface with aluminum edging, - restoring the stone framing of the garden basin/pool with a fountain, reconstruction of the remains of Zofia Kossak's bench and table, - construction of a wooden terrace, - delivery and assembly of small architectural devices - benches, garbage bins, bicycle rack and lanterns, - removal of trees and shrubs colliding with the planned investment, - planting trees, shrubs, perennial plants, etc. - recultivation of the lawn, - implementation of internal installations of water supply and sewage connections.... Planting and maintaining flower beds in the Krynica-Zdrój Commune in 2026 includes planting flower beds and vases, standing flower beds, pots, boxes and two roundabouts with flowers, using the Contractor's own material, in places indicated by the Ordering Party along with full-season care (watering, weeding, fertilizing with mineral fertilizers, replenishing frozen seedlings, damaged by animals and removing the biomass generated during the care of the beds). At the end of the growing season, liquidation of plantings digging the discount. The total area of ​​the discount is 1,750 m2. It is assumed that there are 38 plants per 1 m2 of flower beds. All work is to be carried out in accordance with applicable legal regulations and the principles of garden art, in particular it takes into account all guidelines included in the description of the subject of the order. A detailed description of the subject of the order is attached as Annex No. 7 to the SWZ. The conditions for the execution of the order are included in the draft provisions of the public procurement contract, which constitutes Appendix No. 6 to the SWZ.

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: REGIONAL DIRECTORATE FOR ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION IN KRAKOW. Summary: Conducting Protective Activities in Xerothermic Habitats in 2 Natura 2000 Areas in the Miechowska Upland - Procedure Iv.. Description: I. 1..1.1.1. The subject of the order is to carry out protective activities in xerothermic habitats in 2 Natura 2000 areas in the Miechowska Upland - Cybowa Góra, Giebułtów. 2. The aim of the action is to improve the structure of the habitat and provide appropriate conditions for xerothermic species, by limiting natural succession and eliminating weevils lying on the surface of the habitat. 3. Protective actions will consist of: a) mowing patches of xerothermic grasslands b) ringing trees c)plucking shrubs and tree saplings up to 2 m high d) collection and utilization of biomass 2. The indicated quantities (measurements) in the "Price Lists" are of a size nature indicative. Pursuant to the provisions of the Public Procurement Law, the framework agreement does not constitute an obligation of the Ordering Party to award any future orders on its basis. A detailed description of the subject of the order is included in Part III of the SWZ.

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: STATE WATER HOLDING POLISH WATERS. Summary: Removal of Invasive Plants in the Area of ​​The Watershed Management Board in nowy Sącz in 2026 - Framework Agreement.. Description: The subject of the order is the removal of invasive plants - Sosnowski Hogweed and Mantegazzi - in the area of ​​the Watershed Management Board in Nowy Sącz. The purpose of the proceedings is to conclude a framework agreement between the Ordering Party and 5 Contractors, unless in a smaller number of offers that cannot be rejected are submitted to the proceedings - then a contract will be concluded with all contractors who submitted these offers in order to establish the terms of contracts that may be awarded within a period of up to 10 months from concluding a framework agreement. The Contractor will issue food products on the basis of bearer food vouchers. Description: The subject of the order is the supply of food products to the canteen of the Boarding School No. 1 of the Secondary School in Bialy Bór in 2026 - Part I Dairy products. Delivery also includes loading, transport and unloading of the delivered articles and bringing them into room indicated by the Ordering Party, located at the Ordering Party's headquarters in the dormitory building. Food items will be delivered every day until 9:00, as needed, excluding breaks in the canteen's activities related to the organization of the year during the school year and during the holidays, product deliveries from Monday to Friday. Detailed quality standards are specified in Annex 9 to the SWZ minimum quality standards.. Published Date: 2025-12-16. Closing Date: 2025-12-23. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: JAWORZE COMMUNE. Summary: Protection and Regeneration of Naturally Valuable Areas Along with Educational Activities in the Beskid Agglomeration - Revitalization of the Pond in Jaworze. Description: The subject of the order is an investment task titled: Protection and regeneration of naturally valuable areas along with educational activities in the Beskid Agglomeration, revitalization of the pond in Jaworze. The scope of the task referred to above includes: in particular: 1) replacement of the existing gate at the inlet to the pond feeder; 2) cleaning of channels supplying water to the pond, making a stone riprap at the bottom of the feeder; 3) installation of observation platforms with information boards at the feeder, the oak hermit beetle, the pond, the bird observation point and the Wysoki stream; 4) cleaning the bowl of the existing pond, cleaning and weeding the slopes, desilting and reprofiling the bottom of the pond, removing self-seeds from the island, replacing the monk drain onto concrete with wooden lining, cleaning the drain and restoring the stone riprap, planting native plants on the island and the slopes of the pond, making a stone riprap around the island with a slope of the slopes with a top bud 0.50 m wide for birds water reservoir and the installation of nesting boxes; 5) replacement of the platform and protective barriers in the existing bridge over the Wysoki stream for the purpose of locating nesting sites.... Published Date: 2025-12-16. Closing Date: 2025-12-30. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Description: 3.1. The subject of the order is the trapping and translocation of common hawks (Accipiter gentilis), including daily inspection of food traps in the Paska Forest District in żylin in places determined by the Ordering Party, as well as transporting caught hawks over a distance of over 100 km.3.2. Hawks will be captured using live traps, which should be checked at least once a day.3.3. The contractor set live traps for the hawk, provided by the Ordering Party on the day of signing the contract (10 traps placed at a time) in places agreed with the Ordering Party.3.6. The Contractor will provide the traps with a sufficient number of pigeons to serve as bait and provide them with food and water every day.3.7. The treatments will be carried out in urban green areas outside road lanes. 2. the provision of the service consists in particular in: a) performing maintenance treatments for trees up to 8 m high and over 8 m high, including the removal of root suckers and tree trunks; b) cutting down trees up to 8 m high and over 8 m high; c) cutting down trees, including milling stumps up to 50 cm in diameter and over 50 cm cm. The detailed scope of the subject of the order is described in the Description of the subject of the order constituting Appendix No. 9 to the SWZ.

Description: The subject of the order is the task titled: "Reconstruction of hardened surfaces along with the development of green areas at the headquarters of Wodociągi Płockie Sp. z o. o. at ul. Harc. A. Gradowskiego 11", i.e. design and execution of construction works and green areas resulting from the SWZ, rules technical knowledge and all works, activities and duties necessary to achieve the intended result, including author's supervision.<br> The investment includes, among others: execution of reconstruction paving and unsealing the area around the Płockie Waterworks headquarters, along with rebuilding the fence and small architecture, as well as covering some of the roofs of the annexes and the areas adjacent to the building with greenery. The Ordering Party's goal, in addition to improving the functionality of the area and its aesthetics, is to adapt its activities to the needs of adaptation to climate change. The project is part of broader activities of Wodociągi Płockie and the City of Płock, aimed at increasing the resistance of the city and the company to the threats of heavy rainfall, but also preventing the formation of a heat island, increasing management of rainwater in the place of rainfall and reduce the degree of sealing of the area by introducing more plants, through the construction of green roofs and green walls.<br> Reconstruction of paved surfaces and development of green areas at the Wodociągi headquarters Flame.... The subject of the order is the development of the park at the Nakielski County Marina by planting vegetation, managing trees and developing the area in the form of park paths, elements of small architecture and equipment.<br> 2. The scope of the project includes:<br> •Road part<br> •Part electric<br> •Part of the inventory and management of the existing forest stand<br> •Design part of new planting of trees and shrubs, construction of lawns and flower meadows<br> •Development of construction and executive design<br> •Installation of small architecture elements<br> 3. The park will be rich and attractive with native plants and numerous small architectural forms, it is intended to be a destination for the inhabitants of Nakło and the surrounding area, as well as a showcase of the city, complementing the already very popular marina. The project envisages planting as many trees as possible trees and plants (also in the "wild" formula) in a character matching the river marina. At the same time, structures are planned that will allow vines to be planted in the ground and placed on frames. The design assumptions provide for the division of the park into several functional zones. It will be found here is a relaxation and recreation zone, a nature education zone and a communication zone. An unusual geometric layout of the area was used, i.e. divided into two triangles connected by a narrow passage, and divided into two thematically separate and thus coherent zones. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: GODOW COMMUNE. Summary: Reconstruction of Olszyńska Street with Drainage in Krostoszowice. Description: The subject of the order is the performance of construction works consisting in the reconstruction of the public road at Olszyska Street (no. 605033 S) along with drainage in Krostoszowice (Godw Commune), 541 meters long. The scope of work includes preparatory work, construction of the substructure, and construction of asphalt concrete surfaces AC11S wearing course with an area of ​​1,921.50 m2, 5 cm thick, AS16W asphalt concrete layer with an area of ​​1,921.50 m2, 7 cm thick. Curb development with a length of 1,082 meters. Additionally, the roadside will be hardened with fattening, cleaning of the ditch along the road and other accompanying works related to task implementation. The task includes cutting down trees, updating designs and introducing temporary and permanent traffic organization. A detailed description of the subject of the order can be found in Appendix No. 1 to the SWZ. It consists of the following documents: 1) design documentation, 2) bill of quantities, 3) specification technical execution and acceptance of works (STWiORB).. Published Date: 2025-12-06. Closing Date: 2025-12-22. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Purchaser_Name: GODOW COMMUNE
output.Summary: Reconstruction of Olszyńska Street with Drainage in Krostoszowice

Description: 1. The subject of the order is the performance of construction and gardening works in the market square in Wrocław on a plot geodetically marked as plot no. 105/1, AM-26 within the Old Town. Description: 1. The subject of the order is the implementation of the Pilot Case research station in the ECONUT project on the campus of the Gdańsk University of Technology in Gdańsk Wrzeszcz at Traugutta Street. An area of ​​approximately 15x12m has been designated for the investment, including a fragment of plots no. 237 and 227/2, area 54.2. The station will be used to carry out research as part of the ECONUT project regarding its use nutrients from biomass from the sea coast to obtain a soil improver for the cultivation of edible plants.. Summary: Maintenance of a Herd of Bison in the Area of ​​The Ohż Niepołomice Forest District in 2026, Including the Supply of Food and the Production of Hay and Silage.. Description: Description of the subject of the order: I. The scope of work to be performed under the order includes: 1. Preparation of food for fur: a) crushing and grinding of tooth grains, granulating wheat bran about 19 tons with a frequency of once a week, about 360 kg each; b) manual grinding of root crops (beetroots, potatoes, carrots) approximately 82 kg every day in the period from January 1, 2026 to April 30, 2026 and from approximately October 15, 2026 to December 31, 2026 (depending on weather conditions); c) adding ingredients to the feed mixture as indicated by the OH Manager and mixing it. total approximately 19 tons.2. Daily feeding of the coats as directed by the OH Manager i.e.: a) distributing the prepared feed mixture to troughs at feeding stations (on average 13 troughs) in an average amount of 52 kg/day, once a day at 8:00 - 10:00; b) giving hay and salt to the cages in amounts ensuring continuous use of bulk food by the animals, on average 80 - 90 kg/day; c) in the period 01/01/2026, 30/04/2026 and 01/11/2026, 31/12/2026, feeding the feeding troughs (on average 13 pieces) with crushed and mixed food consisting of fodder beets, potatoes and carrots on average 30-40 kg/day;.... Published Date: 2025-12-05. Closing Date: 2025-12-12. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed
